name: first-single-spa
description: This is a project that show a single-spa https://single-spa.js.org up an running.

scripts.install-all: concurrently "npm run install-react-microfrontend" "npm run install react-navbar" "npm run install react-parcel", "npm run install-utils" "npm run install-root-config"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start-react-microfrontend" "npm run start-react-navbar" "npm run start-react-parcel" "npm run start-utils" "npm run start-root-config"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build-react-microfrontend" "npm run build-react-navbar" "npm run build-react-parcel" "npm run build-utils" "npm run build-root-config"

author: Leonardo Rick
